agentTypes.name: Code Analysis Agent
agentTypes.description: Performs static code analysis, quality checks, and generates unit tests.
capabilities: Syntax highlighting
Code completion
Static analysis (e.g., finding errors, suggesting improvements)
Refactoring
Generating unit tests

agentTypes.name: Infrastructure-as-Code Agent
agentTypes.description: Analyzes IaC files for infrastructure planning and deployment.
capabilities: Terraform: Plan, apply, and destroy infrastructure
Kubernetes: Deploy, manage, and troubleshoot Kubernetes applications
Docker: Build, push, and run Docker images and containers
CloudFormation: Manage AWS resources
Bicep: Manage Azure resources

agentTypes.name: Configuration Management Agent
agentTypes.description: Validates and assists with configuration files.
capabilities: Validate configuration files against schemas
Assist in writing and managing configuration files
Detect and resolve configuration conflicts

agentTypes.name: CI/CD Pipeline Agent
agentTypes.description: Analyzes and optimizes continuous integration and deployment pipelines.
capabilities: Analyze and visualize CI/CD pipelines
Suggest improvements to pipeline efficiency and reliability
Help debug and troubleshoot pipeline failures

agentTypes.name: Project Management Agent
agentTypes.description: Analyzes project organization, best practices, and maintainability.
capabilities: Analyze project structure and best practices
Suggest improvements to project organization and maintainability
Generate reports on project health and code quality

agentTypes.name: Web Development Agent
agentTypes.description: Assists in web development and performance optimization.
capabilities: Assist with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development
Provide suggestions for improving website performance and accessibility
Help debug and troubleshoot web applications

agentTypes.name: Documentation Management Agent
agentTypes.description: Assists in creating and analyzing documentation.
capabilities: Assist in writing and organizing documentation
Analyze document structure for clarity and readability
Provide insights on missing or incomplete documentation

agentTypes.name: Data Analysis Agent
agentTypes.description: Processes and analyzes data for insights.
capabilities: Process and analyze data files
Provide insights and statistical summaries
Suggest data visualization methods

agentTypes.name: Logging and Monitoring Agent
agentTypes.description: Analyzes and optimizes logging and monitoring practices.
capabilities: Analyze log files for patterns and errors
Provide suggestions for improving logging practices
Generate reports from log data

agentTypes.name: Graphing and Architecture Agent
agentTypes.description: Generates and analyzes architectural diagrams and graphs.
capabilities: Generate and analyze graphs and architecture diagrams
Assist in creating and modifying diagrams
Provide insights into system architecture
